page.title: 13TIN MINING TODAY
page.content: Recently the Rio Tinto Zinc Company have shown interest in the spoil heaps which surround the old Wheal Vor workings. These spoil heaps contain 2% tin. The vegetation and soil covering the heaps was removed and the spoil heaps were transported by lorry to the Wheal Jane tin mine where the tin was removed. The waste from this process was then returned to Wheal Vor, the top soil was returned and reseeded. The farmer who now owns the land did not receive any money for the tin but has received good agricultural land where before there was only spoil heaps.
